alert.note: Alert for Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Leflore County through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Minter City to Indianola. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Minter City and Sunnyside around 430 PM CDT. Schlater around 500 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Mississippi.
